name: SPIRIT:
text: I forgot to tell you though . . .

name: SPIRIT:
text: From your point of view, you could se me like a good guy.

name: SPIRIT:
text: By linking with me, I can use all I know about you, to show you many ways in which you could die.

name: SPIRIT:
text: So be careful and try not to get in danger.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Also, don't abuse of my power.

name: SPIRIT:
text: I've been dormant for so long, showing you the future is not an easy task.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Every vision I show takes its toll on my strength.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Eventually, one of these visions might become real . . .
